Package com.jcg.hibernate.maven

Class RemoteDAO

java.lang.Object
com.jcg.hibernate.maven.RemoteDAO
public class RemoteDAO
extends java.lang.Object
The purpose of RemoteDAO is to act as a intermediary between the application and the remote database. It sends creation-, search- and deletion requests to the MySQL database defined in Hibernate.cfg
Author:
Alex, Jani

    • getInstance

      public static RemoteDAO getInstance()
      Returns the instance of RemoteDAO.
      Returns:

    • createGenre

      public boolean createGenre​(Genre genre) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to create a new genre in the database. Will first iterate through all found genreNames, to ensure that it will not allow the creation of a genre that already exists.
      Parameters:
      genre - Given genre that is created
      Returns:
      true if creation went through, false if not
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

    • readGenre

      public Genre readGenre​(int id)
      readGenre() will return a singular Genre-object from the remote database, based on the given genreID
      Parameters:
      id - an ID with which the Genre is found from the database
      Returns:
      genre Genre-object that was found.

    • readGenres

      public Genre[] readGenres()
      readGenres() will return a list of all Genres found within the database.
      Returns:
      Genre[] returns the results in table form.

    • searchGenre

      public Genre searchGenre​(java.lang.String genreSearch) throws java.lang.Exception
      searchGenre() will return a single Genre-object based on a simple String input, used to search the database for the Genre
      Parameters:
      genreSearch - A String used to set the search's parameters
      Returns:
      genre A found Genre
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception

    • editGenre

      public boolean editGenre​(Genre genreEdit, int id)
      editGenre() will update a given Genre based on its ID. This is used to find the Genre from the database, which will then be updated based on a given Genre-object
      Parameters:
      genreEdit - The new Genre-object used to replace the original
      id - an ID used to locate the editable Genre from the database
      Returns:
      boolean true if editing successful.

    • removeGenre

      public boolean removeGenre​(int id)
      removeGenre() will remove a single Genre based on the given genreID
      Parameters:
      id - an ID used to locate the Genre to be removed
      Returns:
      boolean true if removal successful

    • createArtist

      public boolean createArtist​(Artist artist) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to create a new artist in the database. Will first iterate through all found artistNames, to ensure that it will not allow the creation of a artist that already exists.
      Parameters:
      artist - Given artist that is created
      Returns:
      boolean true if creation successful
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • createAlbum

      public boolean createAlbum​(Album album, java.util.Set<Artist> artistList, java.util.Set<Genre> genreList, java.util.Set<Song> songList) throws java.lang.Exception
      createAlbum creates an album inside the database using a Hibernate-session.
      Parameters:
      album - The Album-object to be created in the database
      artistList - A set of Artists to be linked to the new Album
      genreList - A set of Genres to be linked to the new Album
      songList - A set of Songs to be linked to the new Album
      Returns:
      boolean true if successful
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

    • addAlbumGenre

      public boolean addAlbumGenre​(Album album, Genre genre)
      Method used to add an album to a single genre.
      Parameters:
      album - The Album that will receive a new Genre
      genre - The Genre that will be added to the Album
      Returns:
      boolean true if adding a genre successful

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      albumSearch - A String used to set the search's parameters
      Returns:
      album Album found with the search parameter
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

    • editAlbum

      public boolean editAlbum​(int id, Album albumEdit) throws java.lang.Exception

      Parameters:
      id - ID used to locate the original Album within the database
      albumEdit - The new Album that will replace the original
      Returns:
      boolean true if editing successful

      public boolean createSong​(Song song) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method used to create a new song in the database. Will first iterate through all found songNames, to ensure that it will not allow the creation of a song that already exists.
      Parameters:
      song - Song-object that will be used to create a new Song in the database
      Returns:
      boolean true if editing successful
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

    • searchSong

      public Song searchSong​(java.lang.String songSearch) throws java.lang.Exception
      searchSong() will return a single Song-object based on a simple String input, used to search the database for the Song
      Parameters:
      songSearch - A search parameter used to find a single Song from the database
      Returns:
      songList.get(0) The first found object in the database
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

      Parameters:
      songEdit - A Song object that will replace the original in the database
      id - ID used to locate the original Song within the database
      Returns:
      boolean true if editing successful

    • genreAlbums

      public java.util.List<Album> genreAlbums​(int genreID)
      Method takes in a given genre's ID, and then opens a session with it. During the session, an album-list can be created based on the instance After loading the list, the session is closed and the method returns a list of Albums based on the genre
      Parameters:
      genreID - The ID of the Genre used to find the Albums related
      Returns:
      array List of Albums found, related to the Genre given

    • artistAlbums

      public java.util.List<Album> artistAlbums​(int artistID)
      Method takes in a given artist's ID, and then opens a session with it. During the session, an album-list can be created based on the instance After loading the list, the session is closed and the method returns a list of Albums based on the artist
      Parameters:
      artistID - The ID of the Artist used to find the Albums related
      Returns:
      array List of Albums found, related to the Genre given

    • albumSongs

      public java.util.Set<Song> albumSongs​(int albumID)
      Method takes in an album's ID and then opens a session with it. During the session, a song-list can be created based on the instance After loading the list, the session is closed and the method returns a list of Songs based on the album.
      Parameters:
      albumID - The ID of the Album used to find the Songs related
      Returns:
      array List of Songs found, related to the Album given

    • albumArtistList

      public java.util.Set<Artist> albumArtistList​(int albumID)
      Method takes in an album's ID and then opens a session using it. A list of artists is created based on the Album, and the method thus returns a list of Artists related to the given album
      Parameters:
      albumID - The ID of the Album used to find the Artists related
      Returns:
      array List of Artists found, related to the Album given

    • albumGenreList

      public java.util.Set<Genre> albumGenreList​(int albumID)
      Method takes in an album's ID and then opens a session using it. A list of genres is created based on the Album, and the method thus returns a list of Genres related to the given album
      Parameters:
      albumID - The ID of the Album used to find the Genres related
      Returns:
      array List of Genres found, related to the Album given

    • createRequest

      public boolean createRequest​(UserRequests request) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a user submitted request into the database
      Parameters:
      request - The UserRequest object to be saved in the database
      Returns:
      boolean true if request went through
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

      public UserRequests readRequest​(int id)

      Parameters:
      id - ID used to locate a specific User Request within the database
      Returns:
      returnable The User Request found in the database

    • readRequests

      public UserRequests[] readRequests()
      Returns a table of all User Requests from the database
      Returns:
      result An array of all User Requests

    • searchRequestTitle

      public UserRequests searchRequestTitle​(java.lang.String rTitle) throws java.lang.Exception
      Returns a User Request based on a search from the database.
      Parameters:
      rTitle - The search parameter
      Returns:
      requestList.get(0) The first found User Request
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - In case the operation was unsuccessful, the method will throw an exception and roll back the transaction

      public boolean removeRequest​(int id)
      Removes a User Request frmo the database based on a id search
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      boolean true if removal was successful
